title: Does the game always get THIS bad after the season?
body: i havent been playing LOL very long compared to other people i know, and this is my first end of season. the quality of people playing has completely fallen off the face of the planet. im not talking about skill, but just attitude and time wasting behavior...feeding, running in circles and spamming...intentional disconnects. everyone seems to have turned into a troll and i suddenly dont feel like playing at all anymore. is this sort of thing normal?

replies.body:
Yes.

End of season rage and denial about ranked placements and preseason changes, trolling no doubt increased by the current US election.
two troll games then TWO remakes in a row. 40 minutes of nothing but waiting for a match and banning champions. i guess ill wait until the new season to play again lol
